title: Welcome to Rome
description: Arrive in the Eternal City of Rome. Transfer to your hotel and enjoy a welcome reception with your Travel Director and fellow travelers.

title: Discover Ancient Rome and the Vatican City
description: Explore the Vatican Museums, Sistine Chapel, and St. Peter's Basilica. In the afternoon, visit the Colosseum and Roman Forum.

title: Explore the Ruins of Pompeii and Sorrento
description: Journey to the ancient city of Pompeii for a guided tour of the archaeological site. Continue to the coastal town of Sorrento.

title: Cruise to the Isle of Capri
description: Take a boat to the enchanting Isle of Capri. Enjoy a guided tour and free time to explore the charming town and its boutiques.

title: Onwards to Assisi
description: Travel through the Italian countryside to reach Assisi, the birthplace of St. Francis. Take an orientation walk through the town.

title: Venture to Verona and Venice
description: Stop in Verona, the setting for Shakespeare's Romeo and Juliet. Continue to the magical city of Venice.

title: St. Mark's and More in Venice
description: Cruise to St. Mark's Square and visit the Basilica. Watch skilled artisans at work at a glassblowing factory.

title: Stroll Around Milan
description: Head to Milan for a walking tour, including a visit to the Gothic cathedral. Continue to Lake Maggiore.

title: On to Como and Scenic Lake Maggiore
locations: Lake Maggiore → Lake Como → Lake Maggiore
description: Take a private boat to Isola Bella for a guided tour of the Borromeo Palace. Enjoy free time in Como.
